name: Atera Agent Installation
description: Detects successful installation of Atera Remote Monitoring & Management (RMM) agent as recently found to be used by Conti operators
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Application AND event.code:1033 AND winlog.provider_name:MsiInstaller AND Message:*AteraAgent*)`
